Root exception:
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space

EMF 2.1 drivers need Eclipse 3.1 and are not tested to run with Java 5.0 nor do
we commit to that.  Have you tried increasing your heap size? Given a very large
model, you will use up much of memory, and then you can keep making the model
bigger until you actually run out of memory and need to increase the heap size.
So running out of memory is not an indicator of a bug in such a case.  The
bottom line is that this kind of problem report without a test case can't be
accepted.  Besides which, EMF is not at the top of the stack, so for all I know
these other methods that are at the top are chewing through memory like it's in
endless supply. (I doubt that though.)
